TopicTitle: Ability to place kerbals in the EAS-External command seat at hangar

Articles.Content: This is the most annoying thing (Better than it was when you couldnt place kerbals in all cockpits but still) to me right now. Ive been designing little drop boxes for research and just for fun, having a plane to distribute these pods (8) I have to fill it manually and it take like a half hour. Please fix/add this into the game to make everyones life that much easier. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
